agentStats.name: Agent Performance & Stats
agentStats.description: The Genesys Cloud CX Agent Performance Stats is an embeddable component that allows for an agent to view their real time performance stats.
agentStats.title: Agent Performance and Stats

tabs.name: Description
tabs.content: The Genesys Cloud CX Agent Performance Stats is an embeddable component that allows for an agent to view their real time performance stats.

tabs.name: Component Details
tabs.content:
Add component via Lightning App Builder

Full View

This view will show a list of all Interaction Channels with the Agents Performance Statistics.

  • Answered: Answered increments when the agent is the first to connect to the interaction.
  • Avg Talk: The average number of seconds spent interacting on a media type.
  • Avg Hold: The average number of seconds that interactions were placed on hold.
  • Avg ACW: The average amount of time agents spent completing after-call work.
  • AHT: The average amount of time agents spent handling interactions.
  • Transferred: A measurement of the number of interactions an agent answered in one queue and then transferred.
  • Talk: The total amount of time spent interacting on all the conversations by the agent, within an interval.
  • ACW: The number of times after-call work (ACW) was completed.

Mini View

  • Choose which interaction channel to view OR user defined on the UI
  • Choose which Performance Statistics to view OR user defined on the UI

Limitations

  • Note: Not to be used as a dashboard widget for a supervisor.

Additional Details

Embeddable Desktop

Licenses and Permissions

  • Genesys Cloud CX 3 Digital or Genesys Cloud EX license
  • Genesys Cloud CX 3, Genesys Cloud CX 1 WEM Add-on II, or Genesys Cloud CX 2 WEM Add-on I
  • Analytics > Conversation Aggregate > View permission
  • Analytics > User Aggregate > View permission
  • Salesforce Service Cloud
  • CX Cloud from Genesys and Salesforce integration installed
  • Product code

Supported CRMs

Salesforce Lightning

Documentation

  • Terms and Conditions
  • Help Documentation
